headlines.headline: As Bitcoin Rushes Past $122K, What's Next for Ether, XRP, Dogecoin?
headlines.description: “We could see Bitcoin test $130K–$150K by year-end if macro winds cooperate,” one trading desk said.

headlines.headline: Bearish Bitcoin Trader Loses $92M as Surge Wipes Out $426M in Short Liquidations
headlines.description: BTC alone saw $291 million in forced closures, with futures tracking ether (ETH) and XRP following at $68 million and $17 million, respectively.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin, Ether Traders Bet Big With Tuesday's U.S. Inflation Data Seen as Non-Event
headlines.description: BTC and ETH traders bet big through onchain and centralized options markets.

headlines.headline: Japan’s Metaplanet Buys 797 Bitcoin as BTC Breaks Past $120K
headlines.description: Metaplanet's strategy mirrors the blueprint used by Strategy (MSTR): accumulate bitcoin via equity and debt issuance, then use the asset base to secure financing for broader expansion.

headlines.headline: Chart of the Week: 'Hyperbitcoinization' May Not Be Just Maximalist Fantasy Anymore
headlines.description: As the bitcoin price breaks records and institutional demand ramps up, the once-theoretical endgame of hyperbitcoinization is starting to look more like a macro trend than just a crypto dream.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin Breaks $119K, While XLM and HBAR Lead Altcoin Rally
headlines.description: Although bitcoin's move on Sunday delighted bitcoiners, holders of two top 20 altcoins had even more reason to celebrate.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin, Ether Tentative, XRP Steady as Trump Announces 30% Tariff on EU and Mexico
headlines.description: Major coins traded tentatively as Trump escalated trade tensions.

headlines.headline: ‘We Expect Bitcoin to Top $200K by the End of Year’, Says Bitwise CIO
headlines.description: With the bitcoin price reaching a new all-time high earlier this week, crypto industry leaders and analysts are starting to expect a lot more from BTC in 2025.

headlines.headline: Defi Tokens Are Soaring, Leaving Behind OG Coins Like LTC, BCH and XMR
headlines.description: As bitcoin reaches a record high, tokens associated with DeFi and layer-2 networks are outperforming.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin at High Leaves Crypto Stocks Mixed as Strategy, Galaxy Gain, Coinbase Falls
headlines.description: No description found

headlines.headline: Bitcoin's 'Low Volatility' Rally From $70K to $118K: A Tale of Transition From Wild West to Wall Street-Like Dynamics
headlines.description: Bitcoin's recent bull run has been characterized by steady price increases and declining volatility, aligning more with traditional financial markets.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin Rockets Past $118K, Leads to Over $1B Shorts Getting Liquidated
headlines.description: Roughly 237,000 traders were liquidated in total, with the single largest hit being an $88.5 million BTC-USDT short on HTX.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin Hits New All-Time High at $116k, Nearly $1B Shorts Get Liquidated: Markets Liveblog
headlines.description: Analysts and longtime industry participants weigh in on how this week's bitcoin price action resembles — or differs from — past bull runs.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin Breaks Fresh Record Topping $116,000
headlines.description: The new all-time high on Thursday follows multiple attempts to break above the $112,000 level.

headlines.headline: Sequans Communications Kicks Off Bitcoin Treasury with 370 BTC Purchase
headlines.description: The semiconductor firm plans to expand holdings to 3,000 BTC using proceeds from recent its capital raise.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin's Q2 Boom Being Fueled by Corporates: Bitwise
headlines.description: Public companies expand bitcoin treasuries as participation soars.

headlines.headline: This One Metric Suggests Bitcoin Has Plenty of Room Left to Run
headlines.description: Despite new all-time highs, on-chain data signals the rally may be far from over.

headlines.headline: This Chart Points to a 30% Bitcoin Price Boom Ahead: Technical Analysis
headlines.description: IBIT's chart flashes a bullish pattern as BTC's spot price flirts with record highs.

headlines.headline: Shiba Inu Smashes Triangle Pattern Against Bitcoin, But Looks Weak Against Dogecoin
headlines.description: Institutional trading drove significant SHIB price gains, with strong resistance at around $0.00001250, CoinDesk's AI research noted.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin Bulls Increase Exposure as Trump's Pressure on Fed Pushes $15B Into BTC ETFs, Analyst Says
headlines.description: U.S.-listed spot bitcoin ETFs have attracted billions in investor capital over three months amid political pressure on the Federal Reserve to cut rates.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin Tops $111K, on Brink of Breaking Record High; Ether's 6% Jump Leads Major Cryptos
headlines.description: The price of BTC has seemingly been capped at $110,000 for several weeks, with gains quickly reversing each time it approached that level.

headlines.headline: Cathie Wood's ARK: Bitcoin's Bullish Momentum Slows as Long-Term Holder Stacks Hit Record
headlines.description: ARK Invest's June report notes a 15-year high in holdings for long-term bitcoin holders amid declining new investor activity.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin Price Starts Surging After Trump Says 'Fed Rate' Is 300 Basis Points Too High
headlines.description: BTC jumped within 30 minutes of Trump’s rate-cut post as analysts weighed inflation risks and the impact of a potential 300 bp cut on asset prices.

headlines.headline: Patterns Break as Both Short and Long Term Holder Cohorts Accumulate Bitcoin
headlines.description: The stack sizes of long term and short term holders typically move in opposite directions.

headlines.headline: Anthony Pompliano’s ProCap Appears Better Than Peers Based on the BTC HODLer's Own Data
headlines.description: ProCap BTC, now the 13th largest public bitcoin holder, pursues $1 billion merger with CCCM, offering investors both downside protection and upside potential.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin Treasury Firms Expand War Chests as Global Adoption Rises
headlines.description: H100 Group, Remixpoint and LQWD Technologies secured new funding to boost BTC reserves, signaling growing corporate confidence in bitcoin treasuries.

headlines.headline: Key Market Dynamic Keeps Bitcoin, XRP Anchored to $110K and $2.3 as Ether Looks Prone to Volatility
headlines.description: Ether's recent price increase has pushed it into a negative gamma zone, which could increase its market volatility.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin, Ether, Solana, XRP ETFs See Record AUM as Traders Warn of ‘Summer Lull’
headlines.description: Ether-tracked products brought in $226 million, Solana $22 million, and XRP $11 million last week, bringing total ETF assets under management to an all-time high of $188 billion.

headlines.headline: Asia Morning Briefing: Bitcoin Stalls Near $109K as Market Waits for a Catalyst
headlines.description: As Bitcoin trades near highs, market flows are clustering into large caps and memes, with mid-tier tokens losing momentum, say market observers.
